summary: Looney Tunes is an American animation franchise with a long history. It started in 1930 as short films, along with Merrie Melodies, featuring characters like Bugs Bunny and Daffy Duck. The series became very popular in the 1940s and 1950s, moving from black and white to color. It introduced many iconic characters and won several awards. Looney Tunes has since expanded into TV shows, movies, and video games, becoming a worldwide success and a beloved part of animation history.
title: Looney Tunes
